name: Ay Carmela
description:
You are a player entering a game that is under development illegally. You are noticed by the software developers of the game and you want to be kicked out of the game. But there are others out there who want to keep you in the game. Don't leave the game and find out the whole story and how you got into the game!

Ay Carmela is the first chapter of a big story. We planned that make a game about our game and self-development process. It's just a demo of our new visual-novel game and our new game's devlog. We are planning something like this: once a month we will finish and release a chapter of the new story and each chapter will contain 50 levels. At the end of a maximum of 1 year, players will experience both our own development and our access to the final version of our game with an interesting story.
